name: Happy Arkanoid
description:
Happy Arcanoid - Classic Arkanoid

Buttons Main Menu:

Speed Ball - Move slider Left and Right to speed ball

Reset Record - clear save record

Let's Go - start game

Quit - Exit

Buttons Pause Menu:

Continue -  continue play game

Quit - open main menu

Windows app:

Move left - "A"

Move right - "D"

To spawn a bonus ball - "Space Bar"

Pause - "P" 

Main menu - "Esc"

Android app:

Move left - Tap Gold Button onthe Left

Move right - Tap Gold Button onthe Right

To spawn a bonus ball - Tap gold button "The One Ball - One Live"

Pause - Tap Blue Button "Pause"

Main menu - Tap Silver Button "Quit the game"
